scroll-to-right: Scroll to the right for more info

footer.description: A local tech agency providing ready-to-go solutions that cater to businesses of all sizes, offering innovative and customized IT services to help streamline operations and enhance digital presence.

hero.slogun: Empowering Businesses in the Digital Age - Your Partner in IT Solutions.
hero.description: At Buon18, we believe in the power of digital transformation. Our mission is to provide cutting-edge IT solutions that not only meet the current demands of businesses but also anticipate future needs. In a world where everything is becoming digital, we strive to lighten the workload of businesses by offering seamless, reliable, and innovative tech solutions.

home.description-1: Buon18 was established by a group of passionate students in 2022, with a shared vision of becoming a leading provider of IT solutions for businesses. What began as a small freelancing initiative has grown into a robust tech agency committed to driving digital transformation across various industries.
home.description-2: Our team is composed of skilled developers and creative designers who work together to deliver high-quality, customized solutions tailored to the unique needs of each client.

about.information: At Buon18, we believe in the power of digital transformation. Our mission is to provide cutting-edge IT solutions that not only meet the current demands of businesses but also anticipate future needs. In a world where everything is becoming digital, we strive to lighten the workload of businesses by offering seamless, reliable, and innovative tech solutions.
about.welcome: Welcome to Buon18 - where technology meets creativity.

our-work.title: Our Works
our-work.description: Check out some of our recent projects to see how we've helped businesses like yours succeed in the digital world.

quiz-lobby.title: Quiz Lobby
quiz-lobby.description: A quiz platform that helps students prepare for exams and tests.

our-vision.title: Our Vision
our-vision.description: Buon18 envisions becoming a go-to tech agency for businesses seeking reliable, ready-to-deploy IT solutions. Our goal is to simplify the complexities of digitalization by offering solutions that are not only technologically advanced but also easy to implement. We aim to bridge the gap between traditional business operations and the digital world, ensuring that our clients can seamlessly transition into the digital age.
visions: To provide innovative IT solutions that cater to the unique needs of each client.
To deliver high-quality services that exceed client expectations.
To empower businesses to thrive in the digital age.

our-mission.title: Our Mission
our-mission.description: Transform traditional local businesses into fully digitalized entities, enabling them to thrive in an increasingly digital world.

now.description: Focus on content creation, social media management, and blogging to build brand awareness and engage with our target audience.

6-months.description: Transition into a full-fledged IT solution team, capable of bringing clients' ideas to life by providing comprehensive digital solutions that exceed their expectations.

1-year.description: Establish Buon18 as a reputable IT solution company, partnering with experienced business owners to drive digitalization efforts across various industries.

2-years.description: Expand our services to become a local IT solution provider that addresses the specific needs of businesses, helping them to stay competitive in a rapidly evolving market.

contact.description: If you have any questions or inquiries, feel free to contact us. We are here to help you with your IT needs and provide you with the best solutions to meet your requirements.

service.description: We offer various flexible solutions to help businesses establish and grow their online presence. Whether you're looking for a simple, professional website or fully customized system to manage your operations, we have the right package to meet your needs. Each service is to provide the best value while ensuring high-quality results that align with your business goals. Explore our packages below to find the one that best suits your requirements.
service.warning: Please note that the prices are subject to change. Contact us for more information.
